title_field: Explained the Ministry of Health Guidelines and TIP NHI Program
kinyarwanda_title: Gusobanura amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’ubuzima na gahunda y’imiririe myiza ku bana bafite ibyago byo kuba bakwandura agakoko gatera SIDA,y’umushinga wa Ihangane

title_field: Gave information on food/fortified porridge prep and breastfeeding guidelines
kinyarwanda_title: Gutanga ibisobanuro ku biribwa /itegurwa ry’ ifu ikungahaye kuntungamutin ndindanwara n’amabwiriza yo konsa

title_field: Ensured that mother has access to ARVs and understands importance of taking them
kinyarwanda_title: Kumenya neza niba umubyeyi abona imiti igabanya ubukana,kandi ko asobanukiwe n’akamaro ko kuyifata neza

title_field: Gave information on safe water preparation and general hygiene
kinyarwanda_title: Kubigisha ibikurikizwa mu itegurwa ry’ibiryo n’amamzi asukuye,n’isuku muri rusange

title_field: Provided information on birth control and HIV transmission prevention
kinyarwanda_title: Gutegura inyigisho ku kuboneza urubyari no kwirinda kwanduzanya agakoko gatera SIDA

title_field: Assisted participant in reading and signing Rights & Responsibilities and Grievance Procedures
kinyarwanda_title: Abanyamuryango basoma bakanashyira umukono ku burenganzira ,inshingano n’uburyo bwo kurenganurwa byabo

title_field: Provided information on project's income generation plans like farming cooperative
kinyarwanda_title: Gutanga ubusobanuro kubindi bikorwa by’umushinga bibaha inyungu nkubworozi, na gahunda y’amakoperative kubabyeyi

title_field: Encouraged participant to attend CNPB at least 10 times a year
kinyarwanda_title: Kwitabira inama za buri kwezi zibera kumudugudu,zikoreshwa n’abajyanama b’ubuzima, byibura inshuro icumi mumwaka
Kugaragaza no gutanga ibibazo bimaze kuboneka
Kuganira ku mpinduka kuri gahunda zari zafashwer

title_field: Reviewed food and water preparation guidelines
kinyarwanda_title: Gusubiramo ibikurikizwa mu itegurwa ry'ibiryo n'amazi askuye

title_field: Reviewed information on birth control and HIV transmission prevention
kinyarwanda_title: Gusubiramo inyigisho ku kuboneza urubyaro no kwirinda kwanduzanya agakoko gatera SIDA

title_field: Evaluated child’s health to ensure they are not malnourished
kinyarwanda_title: Gusuzuma ubuzima bw’umwana ,ukamenya neza niba hari indwara z’imirire mibi yaba afite

title_field: Provided information on other resources, such as TIP farming and women’s co‐op programs
kinyarwanda_title: Gtanga ibisobanuro kubindi bikorwa by’umushinga bibaha inyungu nk’ubworozi,na gahunda y’amaoperative kubabyeyi

title_field: Reviewed information on birth control and HIV transmission prevention
kinyarwanda_title: Kurebako umunyamuryango yasubije ibibazo bibazwa na porogaramu

title_field: Had participant complete Program Feedback Questionnaire
kinyarwanda_title: Gusubiramo inyigisho kukuboneza urubyaro no kwirinda kwanduzanya agakoko gatera SIDA

title_field: Inform mother that she will have a counseling session on her next visit, which may make her visit longer than it usually is
kinyarwanda_title: Bwira umubyeyi ko azahabwa ubujyanama agarutse kandi ko bizafata igihe kirekire ugereranije n'ibisanzwe
